FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.description: The 12-digit Watershed Boundary Dataset code derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu8.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-8
FacDerivedRadWBDHu8.description: The 8-digit Watershed Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu8Name.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-8 Name
FacDerivedRadWBDHu8Name.description: The 8 digit watershed name derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedStctyFIPS.title: Facility Derived FIPS Code
FacDerivedStctyFIPS.description: The Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code which uniquely identifies the state and county in which the facility is located.

FacDerivedTRIbes.title: FRS Spatially Derived Tribe
FacDerivedTRIbes.description: The tribes or tribal territories located within 25 miles of the facility's location.

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.title: Derived WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.description: The Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (FRS)
FacDerivedWBDHu8.description: Spatially derived HUC based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (FRS Derived)
FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility is located within, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedZip.title: Derived ZIP Code
FacDerivedZip.description: The ZIP Code derived from the facility coordinate.

FacEPARegion.title: Facility EPA Region
FacEPARegion.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

FacFederalAgencyName.title: Federal Agency Name
FacFederalAgencyName.description: Indicates the name of the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government.

FacFederalFlg.title: Federal Flag
FacFederalFlg.description: Indicates whether the facility is part of a federal agency.

FacFormalActionCount.title: Count of Formal Actions
FacFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the total number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years. NA indicates that this measure is not applicable for facilities with no associated CAA, CWA, or RCRA permits

FacImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Waters Flag
FacImpWaterFlg.description: Indicates whether or not the facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired water, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

FacIndianSpatialFlg.title: Indian Spatial Flag
FacIndianSpatialFlg.description: Returns “Y” if a facility is located within a tribal spatial boundary as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau 2010 tribal boundary layer data for tribes in the lower 48 states and Bureau of Land Management Alaska State Office data for native villages in Alaska. Returns “N” if a facility is not located within a tribal or native Alaskan village area.

FacInformalCount.title: Count of Informal Actions
FacInformalCount.description: Indicates the total number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years

FacInspectionCount.title: Facility Inspection Count
FacInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations that have occurred at the facility, under the AIR, CWA, and RCRA, within the last five years. The last 5 years will include data from the 20 most recently completed quarters, plus data from the current quarter up until the refresh date. This count only includes inspection types that are counted as inspections in official counts.

FacLastPenaltyAmt.title: Last Penalty Amount
FacLastPenaltyAmt.description: Indicates the dollar amount of the most recent assessed (or final) penalty taken against the facility.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacMajorFlag.title: Facility Major Flag
FacMajorFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility is designated as a “major” (usually a large facility).

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

FacMyrtkUniverse.title: My Right-to-Know Universe
FacMyrtkUniverse.description: A 3-digit combination of Y/N flags indicating if the facility is considered a Right-to-Know Network (RTKNet) CAA (position 1), NPDES (position 2), or RCRA facility (position 3).

FacNAICSCodes.title: Facility NAICS Codes
FacNAICSCodes.description: The facility's North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

FacNaaFlag.title: NAA Flag
FacNaaFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility is located in a nonattainment area of the country, where air pollution levels persistently exceed the national ambient air quality standards. This flag does not indicate whether or not the facility has violated national ambient area quality standards.

FacName.title: Facility Name
FacName.example: W M A T A CENTRAL MAINT FAC

FacPenaltyCount.title: Penalty Count
FacPenaltyCount.description: The total number of penalties assessed (or final) taken against the facility within the last five years

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

FacPopDen.title: Facility Population Density
FacPopDen.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field).

FacProgramsWithSNC.title: Facility Programs with Significant Violation
FacProgramsWithSNC.description: The number of programs (CAA, CWA, SDWA, RCRA) related to the facility that have a current serious violation.

FacQtrsWithNC.title: Facility Quarters with Violation
FacQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the facility is considered in violation.

FacReferencePoint.title: Facility Reference Point
FacReferencePoint.description: A description of the location for the provided facility coordinate.
FacReferencePoint.example: CENTER OF A FACILITY OR STATION

FacSICCodes.title: SIC Codes
FacSICCodes.description: Indicates the facility’s or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code. The SIC code describes the primary activity of the facility.

FacSNCFlg.title: Facility SNC Flag
FacSNCFlg.description: The Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

FacStreet.title: Facility Street Address
FacStreet.description: Street address where facility is located, as maintained by each data system. Certain data systems also maintain mailing address information, which is not used in this report. The street address may differ across EPA databases due to differences in reported information (e.g., use of mailing address), change in ownership, use of parent or subsidiary address, etc.

FacTotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
FacTotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

FecCaseIDs.description: All Case Numbers of Federal Enforcement Cases relating to the Facility from the ICIS System

FecLastCaseDate.title: Last Enforcement Case Date
FecLastCaseDate.description: The date of the latest Federal Enforcement Case related to this Facility in the ICIS system.

FecNumberOfCases.title: Number of Enforcement Cases
FecNumberOfCases.description: The total number of Federal Enforcement Cases in the last 5 years related to this Facility in the ICIS system.

FecTotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
FecTotalPenalties.description: The total Federal Enforcement Case penalties assessed against this facility in the last 5 years.

FifraInspections5yr.title: FIFRA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
FifraInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of FIFRA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

GHGCO2Releases.title: Greenhouse Gas Reporting CO2 Releases
GHGCO2Releases.description: The sum of total release amounts of all linked Greenhouse Gas IDs reported as "metric tons of CO2 equivalents"

GHGFlag.title: Greenhouse Gas Flag
GHGFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Greenhouse Gas (GHG) permit.

GHGIDs.title: GHG IDs
GHGIDs.description: A unique ID assigned for each facility within EPA’s Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program (GHGRP) Emissions Data Sets.

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

MaxScore.title: Max Score
MaxScore.description: A sorting score for internal use.

NC.title: Non-compliance�Flag
NC.description: Indicates whether or not the permit or site is considered either in Non-compliance (NC), Significant Non-compliance (SNC) or High Priority violation (HPV) status.

NPDESFlag.title: NPDES Flag
NPDESFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Clean Water Act (CWA) permit.

NPDESIDs.title: ICS-NPDES Clean Water Act Identifier
NPDESIDs.description: Clean Water Act ID from the ICIS-NPDES (Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

NaaCategories.title: NAA Categories
NaaCategories.description: The nonattainment area categories that the facility is in, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.�

NaaPollutants.title: NAA Pollutants
NaaPollutants.description: All criteria pollutants that the facility is in nonattainment for.

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility or cluster returned.

Over80CountUs.title: EJ Indexes Above 80th Percentile
Over80CountUs.description: The number of primary EJSCREEN environmental justice (EJ) indexes exceeding the 80th or higher national percentile for the Census block group that the facility is located in.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileO3Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN ozone indicator.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctilePmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN particulate matter indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: RCRA 3-Year Compliance History
RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the RCRA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -�No Violation
V -�Violation
S -�Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

RCRAComplianceStatus.title: RCRA Compliance Status
RCRAComplianceStatus.description: An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (Significant Violation = Significant Noncomplier, Noncompliance, or No Violation).

RCRADateLastFormalAction.title: RCRA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
RCRADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRADaysLastEvaluation.title: RCRA Days Since Last Evaluation
RCRADaysLastEvaluation.description: The number of days since a RCRA inspection was completed.

RCRAFlag.title: Resource Recovery and Conservation Act Flag
RCRAFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Resource Conservation and Recovery Action (RCRA) permit.

RCRAFormalActionCount.title: RCRA Formal Action Count
RCRAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act.

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

RCRAInformalCount.title: RCRA Informal Action Count
RCRAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act.

RCRAInspectionCount.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Inspection Count
RCRAInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act, occurring at the facility within the last five years

RCRALastPenaltyAmt.title: RCRA Last Penalty Amount
RCRALastPenaltyAmt.description: The amount of the most recent penalty entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRALastPenaltyDate.title: RCRA Last Penalty Date
RCRALastPenaltyDate.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRANAICS.title: RCRA NAICS Code
RCRANAICS.description: The RCRA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

RCRAPenalties.title: RCRA Penalties
RCRAPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRAPermitTypes.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Permit Types
RCRAPermitTypes.description:
RCRA Facility Types include:
- TSDF = Treatment, Storage and Disposal facility
- LQG = Large Quantity Generator
- SQG = Small Quantity Generator
- CESQG = Conditionally-Exempt Small Quantity Generator
- Operating TSDF
- Transporters

RCRAQtrsWithNC.title: RCRA Quarters with Violation
RCRAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the RCRA permit is considered in violation.

RCRASNCFlag.title: RCRA SNC Flag
RCRASNCFlag.description: The RCRA Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

RmpIDs.title: RMP IDs
RmpIDs.description: A unique ID assigned to each facility submitting a Risk Management Plan to EPA under the Risk Management Plan Rule.

SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: SDWA 3-Year Compliance History
SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ - No Violation Identified
V - Noncompliance
S - Significant Noncompliance
U - Undetermined

SDWAComplianceStatus.title: SDWA Compliance Status
SDWAComplianceStatus.description: An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Safe Drinking Water Act (Serious Violator, Noncompliance, or No Violation).

SDWAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Safe Drinking Water Act

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

SDWAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Safe Drinking Water Act

SDWAInspections5yr.title: SDWA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
SDWAInspections5yr.description: The number of SDWA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

SDWAQtrsWithNC.title: SDWA Quarters with Violation
SDWAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the SDWA permit is considered in violation.

SDWASNCFlag.title: SDWA SNC Flag
SDWASNCFlag.description: Indicates whether the Water System has a Serious Violation.

SDWISFlag.title: SDWIS Flag
SDWISFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS) ID.

TRIFlag.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program Flag
TRIFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) permit.

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

TRIOffSiteTransfers.title: Toxics Release Inventory Offsite Transfer Count
TRIOffSiteTransfers.description: Total pounds per year transferred off-site.

TRIOnSiteReleases.title: Toxics Release Inventory Onsite Releases
TRIOnSiteReleases.description: Total pounds per year released for Air Emissions, Surface Water Discharges, Underground Injections and Releases to Land.

TRIReleasesTransfers.title: TRI Release Transfers
TRIReleasesTransfers.description: Total chemical releases, in pounds, as reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) by the facility for the most recent reporting year

TRIReporter.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter
TRIReporter.description: Indicates whether or not the facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

TRIReporterInPast.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter In Past Flag
TRIReporterInPast.description: A 'Y' indicates a TRI Reporter from a prior year.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A flag indicating that the facility is within a tribal area.

TscaFlag.title: Toxic Substances Control Act Flag
TscaFlag.description: Flag indicating whether or not a facility has a TSCA ID

TscaIDs.title: Toxic Substances Control Act ID
TscaIDs.description: Toxic Substances Control Act ID assigned to a facility

TscaInspections5yr.title: TSCA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
TscaInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of TSCA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

BadSystemIDs.description: Identifies which passed query system identifiers are invalid.

CAARows.title: Clean Air Act Count
CAARows.description: The number of facilities or cases within the result set that have Clean Air Act (CAA) permits.

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

CWARows.title: Clean Water Act Count
CWARows.description: The number of facilities or cases within the results set that have Clean Water Act (CWA) permits.

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

QueryParameters.title: Query Parameters
QueryParameters.description: A list of submitted query parameters and their values.

RCRRows.title: Resource Recovery and Conservation Act Count
RCRRows.description: The number of facilities or cases within the results set that have Resource Conservation and Recovery Action (RCRA) permits.

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

TRIRows.title: Toxics Release Inventory Row Count
TRIRows.description: The number of facilities within the results set that have Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) permits.

TotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
TotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed or final penalties within the five year time period

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

type.title: Feature
type.description: Static marker indicating object is a GeoJSON Feature.

AIRFlag.title: Clean Air Act Flag
AIRFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Clean Air Act (CAA) permit.

ActiveLower48.description: A Y/N indicator indicating that the facility is active and located within the lower 48 contiguous US States.

BiosolidsFlag.description: A Yes/No field to indicate permits with biosolids management and compliance information.

CAA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: CAA 3-Year Compliance History
CAA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The facility's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the CAA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -�No Violation Identified
V -�Violation Identified
S -�High Priority Violation
U - Undetermined

CAAComplianceStatus.title: CAA Compliance Status
CAAComplianceStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Clean Air Act. When a source has a high priority violation (HPV), the specific type of HPV will be displayed. If more than one type applies to a source, this order of priority is used to determine which type appears:
Violation Unaddressed, EPA has Lead Enforcement
Violation Unaddressed, State has Lead Enforcement
Violation Unaddressed, Local has Lead Enforcement
Violation Addressed, EPA has Lead Enforcement
Violation Addressed, State has Lead Enforcement
Violation Addressed, Local has Lead Enforcement
When there is no Federally-Reportable Violation determination date in the past year and no open High Priority Violation in the most recent quarter in the data system of record, “Not Available” is displayed.

CAADateLastFormalAction.title: CWA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
CAADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the CAA program database.

CAAEvaluationCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations under the Clean Air Act, occurring at the facility within the last five years

CAAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Air Act.

CAAHpvFlag.title: CAA HPV Flag
CAAHpvFlag.description: The High Priority Violator (HPV) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data system. "Y" indicates the facility is in HPV for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in HPV.

CAAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Air Act.

CAALastPenaltyDate.title: CWA Date of Last Penalty
CAALastPenaltyDate.description: The effective date of the most recent penalty entered into the CAA program database.

CAANAICS.title: CAA NAICS
CAANAICS.description: The CAA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

CAAPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Air Act.

CAAPermitTypes.description:
ICIS AIR Permit Types associated with the FRS Facility:
- Major
- Federally Reportable Minor
- Other Minor
- Synthetic Minor
- NULL

CAASICs.title: CAA SIC
CAASICs.description: The CAA permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Codes.

CWA13qtrsComplHistory.title: CWA 3-Year Compliance History
CWA13qtrsComplHistory.description:
The facility's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the CWA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -�No Violation
V -�Violation
S -�Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

CWA13qtrsEfflntExceedances.title: Effluent Exceedances in past 13 Quarters
CWA13qtrsEfflntExceedances.description: The number of effluent violations at the facility in the past 13 quarters.

CWA3YrQncrCodes.title: 3 Year QNCR Codes
CWA3YrQncrCodes.description: No longer used.  Will be deleted in nthe future.

CWAComplianceStatus.title: CWA Compliance Status
CWAComplianceStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Clean Water Act. When a major source is in significant noncompliance (SNC) or a non-major source has a Category I violation, the specific type of SNC/Category I will be displayed. If more than one type applies to a facility, this order of priority is used to determine which code appears:
S(CSchVio) - an enforcement action has been issued, and the facility is not meeting its compliance schedule
E(EffViol) - effluent violations of monthly average limits
X(EffNMth) - effluent violations of non-monthly average limits
T(CSchRpt) - compliance schedule reporting violation
D(DMR NR) - non-receipt of discharge monitoring report

CWAComplianceTracking.title: CWA Compliance Tracking
CWAComplianceTracking.description: The Compliance Tracking classifications which can assist in interpreting the facility's compliance status, particularly for non-major standard permittees.

CWADateLastFormalAction.title: CWA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
CWADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the CWA program database.

CWAFormalActionCount.title: Clean Water Act Formal Action Count
CWAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Water Act.

CWAInformalCount.title: Clean Water Act Informal Action Count
CWAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Water Act.

CWAInspectionCount.title: Clean Water Act Inspection Count
CWAInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations under the Clean Water Act, occurring at the facility within the last five years.

CWALastPenaltyAmt.title: CWA Last Penalty Amount
CWALastPenaltyAmt.description: The amount of the most recent penalty entered into the CWA program database.

CWALastPenaltyDate.title: CWA Date of Last Penalty
CWALastPenaltyDate.description: The effective date of the most recent penalty entered into the CWA program database.

CWANAICS.title: CWA NAICS Code
CWANAICS.description: The CWA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

CWAPenalties.title: Clean Water Act Penalties
CWAPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years under the Clean Water Act.

CWAPermitTypes.title: Clean Water Act Permit Types
CWAPermitTypes.description:
Indicates the facility's permit type or designation.
- Major
- Minor

CWAQtrsWithNC.title: CWA Quarters with Violation
CWAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the CWA permit is considered in violation.

CWASICs.title: CWA SIC Code
CWASICs.description: The CWA permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Codes.

CWASNCFlag.title: CWA SNC Flag
CWASNCFlag.description: The CWA Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

CamdIDs.title: Clean Air Markets Division Identifiers
CamdIDs.description: Facility identifiers for the Clean Air Markets Division database.

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

DfrUrl.title: DFR URL
DfrUrl.description: The URL to the facility's Detailed Facility Report.

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

EisFlag.title: Emissions Inventory System Flag
EisFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility reports to the Emissions Inventory System (EIS).

EisIDs.title: EIS IDs
EisIDs.description: A unique ID assigned for each facility within EPA’s Emissions Inventory System (EIS) Database.

EjscreenFlag.title: EJ Screen Flag
EjscreenFlag.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

EjscreenFlagUs.title: EJ Screen Flag (US)
EjscreenFlagUs.description: A Y/N indicator identifying whether or not the facility is within an Environmental Justice area.

EpcraInspections5yr.title: EPCRA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
EpcraInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of EPCRA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

Fac3yrComplianceHistory.title: Facility 3-Year Compliance History
Fac3yrComplianceHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -�No Violation
V -�Violation
S -�Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

FacActiveFlag.title: Facility Active Flag
FacActiveFlag.description: Indicates whether any of the associated ICIS-Air, ICIS-NPDES, RCRAInfo or SDWIS permits/facilities are in an active status.

FacChesapeakeBayFlg.title: Facility in Chesapeake Bay Watershed Flag
FacChesapeakeBayFlg.description: Indicates whether the facility, based on the facility spatial coordinate, is within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

FacCity.title: Facility City
FacCity.description: The city where the facility is located.

FacCollectionMethod.title: Facility Location Collection Method
FacCollectionMethod.description: Indicates the collection method used (GPS, Photo Interpolation, Address Geocode, etc) to determine a facility's spatial coodinate.

FacComplianceStatus.title: Facility Compliance Status
FacComplianceStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's known overall compliance status. Status codes include:
SNC/Serious Viol [significant noncompliance (SNC), high priority violation (HPV), or serious violator, depending on statute]
In Violation (in violation of an environmental regulation)
No Violation (no violations recorded in the national systems of record)
Not Available
Unknown

FacCounty.title: Facility County
FacCounty.description: The county where the facility is located.

FacDateLastFormalActEPA.title: Date Last EPA Formal Enforcement Action
FacDateLastFormalActEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility.

FacDateLastFormalActSt.title: Date Last Formal Enforcement Action by State
FacDateLastFormalActSt.description: The effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state agency.

FacDateLastFormalAction.title: Date of Last Formal Action
FacDateLastFormalAction.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action taken against the facility.

FacDateLastInformalActEPA.title: Date Last EPA Informal Enforcement Action
FacDateLastInformalActEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility.

FacDateLastInformalActSt.title: Date Last Informal Enforcement Action by State
FacDateLastInformalActSt.description: The effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state agency.

FacDateLastInformalAction.title: Date of Last Informal Action
FacDateLastInformalAction.description: The date of the most recent informal action or NOV taken recorded in AFS, ICIS-NPDES, RCRA Info or SDWIS.

FacDateLastInspection.title: Date of Last Facility Inspection
FacDateLastInspection.description: The date on which most recent inspection of the facility took place. For the Clean Air Act, the date on which a Full Inspection (FCE) was completed. This date may or may not correspond to an actual site visit. A series of partial on- or off-site inspections may have been conducted during the fiscal year as part of this FCE.

FacDateLastInspectionEPA.title: Date Last EPA Inspection
FacDateLastInspectionEPA.description: The date of the facility's last inspection.

FacDateLastInspectionState.title: Date Last Inspection by State
FacDateLastInspectionState.description: The date on which the most recent "olfficial"  inspection of the facility by a state agency took place.

FacDateLastPenalty.title: Date of Last Penalty
FacDateLastPenalty.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility.

FacDaysLastInspection.title: Days Since Last Facility Inspection
FacDaysLastInspection.description: The number of days from the last ECHO refresh to the date on which the most recent inspection of the facility took place based on data recorded into AFS, ICIS-NPDES, or RCRA Info.

FacDerivedCb2010.title: Derived 2010 Census Block
FacDerivedCb2010.description: The 2010 Census Block derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedCd113.title: Derived 113th Congressional District
FacDerivedCd113.description: The 113th Congressional District derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12.description: The 12-digit Watershed Boundary Dataset code derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedRadWBDHu12Name.description: The 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu8.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-8
FacDerivedRadWBDHu8.description: The 8-digit Watershed Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedRadWBDHu8Name.title: Derived RAD WBD HUC-8 Name
FacDerivedRadWBDHu8Name.description: The 8 digit watershed name derived from Reach Indexing the facility's spatial coordinate against the 12 digit Watershed Boundary Dataset from USGS.

FacDerivedStctyFIPS.title: Facility Derived FIPS Code
FacDerivedStctyFIPS.description: The Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) code which uniquely identifies the state and county in which the facility is located.

FacDerivedTRIbes.title: FRS Spatially Derived Tribe
FacDerivedTRIbes.description: The tribes or tribal territories located within 25 miles of the facility's location.

FacDerivedWBD.title: 12-Digit WBD HUC
FacDerivedWBD.description: The Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC-12) of the waterbody in which the facility resides, derived based on location data in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.title: Derived WBD HUC-12 Name
FacDerivedWBDHu12Name.description: The Watershed Boundary Dataset name derived from the facility coordinate.

FacDerivedWBDHu8.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Code (FRS)
FacDerivedWBDHu8.description: Spatially derived HUC based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.title: WBD Hydrologic Unit Name (FRS Derived)
FacDerivedWBDHu8Name.description: The name of the hydrologic unit in which the facility is located within, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.

FacDerivedZip.title: Derived ZIP Code
FacDerivedZip.description: The ZIP Code derived from the facility coordinate.

FacEPARegion.title: Facility EPA Region
FacEPARegion.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

FacFederalAgencyName.title: Federal Agency Name
FacFederalAgencyName.description: Indicates the name of the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government.

FacFederalFlg.title: Federal Flag
FacFederalFlg.description: Indicates whether the facility is part of a federal agency.

FacFormalActionCount.title: Count of Formal Actions
FacFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the total number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years. NA indicates that this measure is not applicable for facilities with no associated CAA, CWA, or RCRA permits

FacImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Waters Flag
FacImpWaterFlg.description: Indicates whether or not the facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired water, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

FacIndianSpatialFlg.title: Indian Spatial Flag
FacIndianSpatialFlg.description: Returns “Y” if a facility is located within a tribal spatial boundary as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau 2010 tribal boundary layer data for tribes in the lower 48 states and Bureau of Land Management Alaska State Office data for native villages in Alaska. Returns “N” if a facility is not located within a tribal or native Alaskan village area.

FacInformalCount.title: Count of Informal Actions
FacInformalCount.description: Indicates the total number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years

FacInspectionCount.title: Facility Inspection Count
FacInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations that have occurred at the facility, under the AIR, CWA, and RCRA, within the last five years. The last 5 years will include data from the 20 most recently completed quarters, plus data from the current quarter up until the refresh date. This count only includes inspection types that are counted as inspections in official counts.

FacLastPenaltyAmt.title: Last Penalty Amount
FacLastPenaltyAmt.description: Indicates the dollar amount of the most recent assessed (or final) penalty taken against the facility.

FacMajorFlag.title: Facility Major Flag
FacMajorFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility is designated as a “major” (usually a large facility).

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

FacMyrtkUniverse.title: My Right-to-Know Universe
FacMyrtkUniverse.description: A 3-digit combination of Y/N flags indicating if the facility is considered a Right-to-Know Network (RTKNet) CAA (position 1), NPDES (position 2), or RCRA facility (position 3).

FacNAICSCodes.title: Facility NAICS Codes
FacNAICSCodes.description: The facility's North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Codes.

FacNaaFlag.title: NAA Flag
FacNaaFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility is located in a nonattainment area of the country, where air pollution levels persistently exceed the national ambient air quality standards. This flag does not indicate whether or not the facility has violated national ambient area quality standards.

FacName.title: Facility Name
FacName.example: W M A T A CENTRAL MAINT FAC

FacPenaltyCount.title: Penalty Count
FacPenaltyCount.description: The total number of penalties assessed (or final) taken against the facility within the last five years

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

FacPopDen.title: Facility Population Density
FacPopDen.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field).

FacReferencePoint.title: Facility Reference Point
FacReferencePoint.description: A description of the location for the provided facility coordinate.
FacReferencePoint.example: CENTER OF A FACILITY OR STATION

FacSICCodes.title: SIC Codes
FacSICCodes.description: Indicates the facility’s or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code. The SIC code describes the primary activity of the facility.

FacSNCFlg.title: Facility SNC Flag
FacSNCFlg.description: The Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

FacStdCountyName.title: FRS Standardized Facility County Name
FacStdCountyName.description: The standardized  facility county name from EPA's Facility Registry System

FacStreet.title: Facility Street Address
FacStreet.description: Street address where facility is located, as maintained by each data system. Certain data systems also maintain mailing address information, which is not used in this report. The street address may differ across EPA databases due to differences in reported information (e.g., use of mailing address), change in ownership, use of parent or subsidiary address, etc.

FacTotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
FacTotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

FecCaseIDs.description: All Case Numbers of Federal Enforcement Cases relating to the Facility from the ICIS System

FecLastCaseDate.title: Last Enforcement Case Date
FecLastCaseDate.description: The date of the latest Federal Enforcement Case related to this Facility in the ICIS system.

FifraInspections5yr.title: FIFRA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
FifraInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of FIFRA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

GHGCO2Releases.title: Greenhouse Gas Reporting CO2 Releases
GHGCO2Releases.description: The sum of total release amounts of all linked Greenhouse Gas IDs reported as "metric tons of CO2 equivalents"

GHGFlag.title: Greenhouse Gas Flag
GHGFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Greenhouse Gas (GHG) permit.

GHGIDs.title: GHG IDs
GHGIDs.description: A unique ID assigned for each facility within EPA’s Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program (GHGRP) Emissions Data Sets.

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

NC.title: Non-compliance�Flag
NC.description: Indicates whether or not the permit or site is considered either in Non-compliance (NC), Significant Non-compliance (SNC) or High Priority violation (HPV) status.

NPDESFlag.title: NPDES Flag
NPDESFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Clean Water Act (CWA) permit.

NPDESIDs.title: ICS-NPDES Clean Water Act Identifier
NPDESIDs.description: Clean Water Act ID from the ICIS-NPDES (Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

NaaCategories.title: NAA Categories
NaaCategories.description: The nonattainment area categories that the facility is in, derived spatially based on the facility's geographic coordinates in FRS.�

NaaPollutants.title: NAA Pollutants
NaaPollutants.description: All criteria pollutants that the facility is in nonattainment for.

Over80CountUs.title: EJ Indexes Above 80th Percentile
Over80CountUs.description: The number of primary EJSCREEN environmental justice (EJ) indexes exceeding the 80th or higher national percentile for the Census block group that the facility is located in.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileO3Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN ozone indicator.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctilePmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN particulate matter indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: RCRA 3-Year Compliance History
RCRA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period) entered in the RCRA program database. Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ -�No Violation
V -�Violation
S -�Significant Violation
U - Undetermined

RCRAComplianceStatus.title: RCRA Compliance Status
RCRAComplianceStatus.description: An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (Significant Violation = Significant Noncomplier, Noncompliance, or No Violation).

RCRADateLastFormalAction.title: RCRA Date of Last Formal Enforcement Action
RCRADateLastFormalAction.description: The effective date of the most recent listed enforcement action entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRAFlag.title: Resource Recovery and Conservation Act Flag
RCRAFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Resource Conservation and Recovery Action (RCRA) permit.

RCRAFormalActionCount.title: RCRA Formal Action Count
RCRAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act.

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

RCRAInformalCount.title: RCRA Informal Action Count
RCRAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act.

RCRAInspectionCount.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Inspection Count
RCRAInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act, occurring at the facility within the last five years

RCRALastPenaltyAmt.title: RCRA Last Penalty Amount
RCRALastPenaltyAmt.description: The amount of the most recent penalty entered into the RCRA program database.

RCRALastPenaltyDate.title: RCRA Last Penalty Date
RCRALastPenaltyDate.description: Indicates the date on which the most recent assessed (or final) penalty was taken against the facility, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRANAICS.title: RCRA NAICS Code
RCRANAICS.description: The RCRA permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

RCRAPenalties.title: RCRA Penalties
RCRAPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of assessed (or final) penalties taken against the facility within the last five years, entered in the RCRAInfo program database.

RCRAPermitTypes.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Permit Types
RCRAPermitTypes.description:
RCRA Facility Types include:
- TSDF = Treatment, Storage and Disposal facility
- LQG = Large Quantity Generator
- SQG = Small Quantity Generator
- CESQG = Conditionally-Exempt Small Quantity Generator
- Operating TSDF
- Transporters

RCRASNCFlag.title: RCRA SNC Flag
RCRASNCFlag.description: The RCRA Significant Non-compliance (SNC) status for the facility during the most recent quarter reflects the time the records were extracted from the program data systems. "Y" indicates the facility is in SNC for the permit or site in question and may pose a more severe level of environmental threat. "N" indicates the permit or site is not considered in SNC.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

RmpIDs.title: RMP IDs
RmpIDs.description: A unique ID assigned to each facility submitting a Risk Management Plan to EPA under the Risk Management Plan Rule.

SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.title: SDWA 3-Year Compliance History
SDWA3yrComplQtrsHistory.description:
The system's 3-year compliance status history by quarter (3-month period). Each character represents a quarter of compliance, going from oldest to most recent. Character values correspond to the following compliance statuses:
_ - No Violation Identified
V - Noncompliance
S - Significant Noncompliance
U - Undetermined

SDWAComplianceStatus.title: SDWA Compliance Status
SDWAComplianceStatus.description: An indication of the facility's compliance status under the Safe Drinking Water Act (Serious Violator, Noncompliance, or No Violation).

SDWAFormalActionCount.description: Indicates the number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years under the Safe Drinking Water Act

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

SDWAInformalCount.description: Indicates the number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years under the Safe Drinking Water Act

SDWAInspections5yr.title: SDWA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
SDWAInspections5yr.description: The number of SDWA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

SDWAQtrsWithNC.title: SDWA Quarters with Violation
SDWAQtrsWithNC.description: The number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the SDWA permit is considered in violation.

SDWASNCFlag.title: SDWA SNC Flag
SDWASNCFlag.description: Indicates whether the Water System has a Serious Violation.

SDWISFlag.title: SDWIS Flag
SDWISFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS) ID.

TRIFlag.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program Flag
TRIFlag.description: Indicates whether the facility has a Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) permit.

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

TRIOffSiteTransfers.title: Toxics Release Inventory Offsite Transfer Count

TRIReleasesTransfers.title: TRI Release Transfers
TRIReleasesTransfers.description: Total chemical releases, in pounds, as reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) by the facility for the most recent reporting year

TRIReporter.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter
TRIReporter.description: Indicates whether or not the facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

TRIReporterInPast.title: Toxics Release Inventory Reporter In Past Flag
TRIReporterInPast.description: A 'Y' indicates a TRI Reporter from a prior year.

TRIbalFlag.title: Tribal Lands Flag
TRIbalFlag.description: A value of "1" indicates that the facility is within an Indian Tribal or Alaskan Native Village area.

TscaFlag.title: Toxic Substances Control Act Flag
TscaFlag.description: Flag indicating whether or not a facility has a TSCA ID

TscaIDs.title: Toxic Substances Control Act ID
TscaIDs.description: Toxic Substances Control Act ID assigned to a facility

TscaInspections5yr.title: TSCA Inspections (Past 5 Years)
TscaInspections5yr.description: From ICIS FE&C, the number of TSCA inspections at the facility in the past five years.

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

WebDocs.title: Web Documents
WebDocs.description: Contains flags that identify what web accessible documents are available for the facility.

Facilities.title: Facilities
Facilities.description: A complex array of facility information.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

coordinates.title: Coordinates Array
coordinates.description: Array of coordinate values in longitude, latitude format.

type.title: Geometry
type.description: Indicator of the geometry represented in the GeoJSON Feature, for Echo will always be "Point".

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

DataLength.title: Data Length
DataLength.description: Data length for EPA program database column.

DataType.title: Data Type
DataType.description: Data type for EPA program database column.

ObjectName.title: Object Name
ObjectName.description: The JSON name used for the database column.

q.c1_lat.name: c1_lat
q.c1_lat.description: Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c1_long.name: c1_long
q.c1_long.description: Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c2_lat.name: c2_lat
q.c2_lat.description: Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.c2_long.name: c2_long
q.c2_long.description: Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.callback.name: callback
q.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

q.descending.name: descending
q.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

q.maplist.name: maplist
q.maplist.description: Map List Flag.  Provide a Y to return mappable coordinates representing the full geographic extent of the queryset (all facilities that met the selection criteria).

q.newsort.name: newsort
q.newsort.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

q.p_act.name: p_act
q.p_act.description: Active Permits/Facilities Flag.  Provide Y or N to filter results to facilities with active permits.

q.p_agoo.name: p_agoo
q.p_agoo.description: Indicates whether to AND or OR the Owner/Operator parameter (p_owop) and the federal agency code (p_fa) parameters.

q.p_c1lat.name: p_c1lat
q.p_c1lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c1lon.name: p_c1lon
q.p_c1lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 1st corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c2lat.name: p_c2lat
q.p_c2lat.description: In decimal degrees.  Latitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_c2lon.name: p_c2lon
q.p_c2lon.description: In decimal degrees.  Longitude of 2nd corner of box that bounds the resulting facilities. The latitude and longitude of both corners of the bounding box must be provided.

q.p_co.name: p_co
q.p_co.description: Facility County Filter. Provide a single county name in combination with a state value provided via p_st.

q.p_cs.name: p_cs
q.p_cs.description:
Facility Compliance Limiter.  Enter 2, 3 or 4 to limit facilities returned.
- 2 = Facilities in noncompliance.
- 3 = Facilities having one or more programs reporting significant noncompliance.
- 4 = Facilities having more than one program reporting significant noncompliance.

q.p_ct.name: p_ct
q.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

q.p_ejscreen.name: p_ejscreen
q.p_ejscreen.description: Enter "Y" to limit facilities to Census block groups where one of more Environmental Justice indexes above 80th percentile.

q.p_ejscreen_over80cnt.name: p_ejscreen_over80cnt
q.p_ejscreen_over80cnt.description: The number of Environmenmt Justice Indicators above the 80th percentile.  Valid values are 1 through 11.

q.p_fa.name: p_fa
q.p_fa.description: Federal Agency. 1 character or 5-character values; may contain multiple comma-separated values. ALL will retrieve all facilities where the federal agency code is not null.  Use the Federal Agencies lookup service to obtain a list of values.

q.p_fac_icos.name: p_fac_icos
q.p_fac_icos.description: FRS tribal land spatial flag.  Enter "Y" or "N" to include or exclude facilities based on FRS tribal land spatial flag.

q.p_fea.name: p_fea
q.p_fea.description:
Formal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_fead1 and p_fead2 or by parameter p_feay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_fea_5yr.name: p_fea_5yr
q.p_fea_5yr.description: A Y value identifies facilities that have had a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years.

q.p_feaa.name: p_feaa
q.p_feaa.description:
Agency associated with Formal Enforcement Actions:
- E = EPA
- S = State
- A = All

q.p_feac.name: p_feac
q.p_feac.description: Formal Enforcment Action Last Case Date Limiter Flag.  Enter a value of "Y" to additionally apply the p_feay year filter to the last formal enforcement action case date.  Use the p_fea parameter to control if the filter is within or outside the date span provided.

q.p_feay.name: p_feay
q.p_feay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Formal Enforcement Actions (FEA). Used along with p_fea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find FEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

q.p_ff.name: p_ff
q.p_ff.description: Federal Facility Indicator Flag. Enter Y to restrict searches to federal facilities.

q.p_fips.name: p_fips
q.p_fips.description: FIPS Code Filter.  Enter a single 5-character Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) state + county value to restrict results.  E.g. to limit results to Kenosha County, Wisconsin, use 55059.

q.p_fn.name: p_fn
q.p_fn.description: Facility Name Filter. Enter one or more case-insensitive facility names to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.  See p_fntype for additional modifiers.

q.p_fntype.name: p_fntype
q.p_fntype.description:
Controls type of text search performed on facility name with parameter p_fn.
- EXACT = Find facilities having the exact provided name(s).
- BEGINS = Find facilities with names starting with the provided term(s).
- ALL = Find facilities using Oracle text search terms.
- CONTAINS =

q.p_frs.name: p_frs
q.p_frs.description: Facility Registry Service ID Filter. Enter a single 12-digit FRS identifier to filter results.

q.p_huc.name: p_huc
q.p_huc.description: 2-, 4-, 6-, or 8-character watershed code. May contain multiple comma-separated values.

q.p_ico.name: p_ico
q.p_ico.description: Indian Country Flag.  Enter a "Y" or "N" to restrict searches to facilities inside or outside Indian Country.

q.p_icoo.name: p_icoo
q.p_icoo.description: Indian country search and/or flag.  Enter "Y" to set indian country search conditions to return any results found using p_ico, p_fac_ico or p_fac_icoo.  Otherwise only results matching all provided p_ico, p_fac_ico or p_fac_icoo conditions will be returned.

q.p_iea.name: p_iea
q.p_iea.description:
Informal Enforcement Actions [within / not within] specified date range.  The date range is determined by parameters p_iead1 and p_iead2 or by parameter p_ieay.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_iea_5yr.name: p_iea_5yr
q.p_iea_5yr.description: A Y value identifies facilities that have had an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years.

q.p_ieaa.name: p_ieaa
q.p_ieaa.description:
Agency associated with Informal Enforcement Actions. If left blank, both agencies are included.
- E = EPA
- S = State

q.p_ieay.name: p_ieay
q.p_ieay.description: Years (1 to 5) Range.  This value is used to create a date range for Informal Enforcement Actions (IEA). Used along with p_iea (which indicates whether to look within or outside of the date range) to find IEAs within (or not within) the number of years specified.

q.p_impw.name: p_impw
q.p_impw.description: Discharging into Impaired Waters Flag. Enter Y to limit results to facilities with discharge to waterbodies listed as impaired in the ATTAINS database.

q.p_istatute.name: p_istatute
q.p_istatute.description: For use in identifying Facilities that have an inspection performed under the entered Statute.

q.p_limit_addr.name: p_limit_addr
q.p_limit_addr.description: Limit Address Search Flag.  Enter Y to restrict facility searches to native data source only.

q.p_mact.name: p_mact
q.p_mact.description: CAA Maximum Achievable Control Technology (MACT) Subpart codes (alpha ID between 1 and 7 characters) applicable to the facility.

q.p_maj.name: p_maj
q.p_maj.description: Major Facility Flag.  Enter Y to restrict results to Major facilities only.

q.p_med.name: p_med
q.p_med.description: Filter Results by Media.- A = Air- C = CAMD (Clean Air Markets Division)- E = EIS (Emissions Inventory Systems)- G = GHG (Greenhouse Gases)- M = RMP (Risk Management Plan)- R = RCRA (Hazardous Waste)- S = SDWA (Public Drinking Water Systems)- T = TRI (Toxic Release Inventory)- TSCA = TSCA (Toxic Substances Control Act)- W = Water- ALL = Air and Water and RCRA

q.p_naa.name: p_naa
q.p_naa.description: Non-Attainment Area Flag.  Enter a Y or N to filter for or against facilities flagged as non-attainment areas.

q.p_ncs.name: p_ncs
q.p_ncs.description: North American Industry Classification System Filter. Enter two to six digits to filter results to facilities having matching NAICS codes.  Digits less than six will match to all codes beginning with the provided values.

q.p_ocr.name: p_ocr
q.p_ocr.description:
Toxics Release Inventory Pounds of On-Site Chemical Releases Limiter.  Enter a keyword to filter results.
- Z = Zero pounds of chemical releases.
- GT0 = More than zero pounds of chemical releases.
- GT1000 = More than one thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT5000 = More than five thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT10000 = More than ten thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT20000 = More than twenty thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT50000 = More than fifty thousand pounds of chemical releases.

q.p_oct.name: p_oct
q.p_oct.description:
Toxic Release Inventory Pounds of Off-Site Chemical Releases Limiter.  Enter a keyword to filter results.
- Z = Zero pounds of chemical releases.
- GT0 = More than zero pounds of chemical releases.
- GT1000 = More than one thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT5000 = More than five thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT10000 = More than ten thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT20000 = More than twenty thousand pounds of chemical releases.
- GT50000 = More than fifty thousand pounds of chemical releases.

q.p_pd.name: p_pd
q.p_pd.description:
Population Density Limiter (per sq mile). Enter a value to limit results to facilities located in area of a given population density.
- NONE = 0 population density per square mile
- GT100 = More than 100 population density per square mile
- GT500 = More than 500 population density per square mile
- GT1000 = More than 1000 population density per square mile
- GT5000 = More than 5000 population density per square mile
- GT10000 = More than 10000 population density per square mile
- GT20000 = More than 20000 population density per square mile

q.p_pen.name: p_pen
q.p_pen.description:
Last Penality Date Qualifier Filter.  Enter one of the following:   
- NEVER = No Penalties
- ANY = Any Penalty
- LEXX = Less than or equal to XX months.  Provide a number in place of XX, e.g. "LE5" for a facility with a penalty within previous 5 months.
- GTXX = Greater than XX months.  Provide a number in place of XX, eg. GT12, for a facility with the last penalty greater than 12 months ago.

q.p_pid.name: p_pid
q.p_pid.description: Nine-digit permit IDs. May contain up to 2000 comma-separated values.

q.p_pm.name: p_pm
q.p_pm.description:
Percent Minority Population Limiter.  Enter a value to restrict results to facilities with a given percentage of minority population within 3-mile radius.
- NONE = 0%
- GT5 = greater than 5%
- GT10 = greater than 10%
- GT25 = greater than 25%
- GT50 = greater than 50%
- GT75 = greater than 75%

q.p_pretty_print.name: p_pretty_print
q.p_pretty_print.description: Optional flag to request GeoJSON formatted results to be pretty printed.  Only provide a numeric value when the output needs to be human readable as pretty printing has a performance cost.

q.p_qid.name: p_qid
q.p_qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

q.p_qiv.name: p_qiv
q.p_qiv.description:
Quarters in Noncompliance Limiter.  Enter a coded value to limit results to facilities with given quarter of noncompliance.
- Z = Zero quarters in noncompliance.
- GEXX = Replacing XX with a numeric value, that number of quarterd or more in noncompliance.
- GTXX = Replacing XX with a numeric value, more than that number of quarters in noncompliance.

q.p_qs.name: p_qs
q.p_qs.description: Quick Search. Allows entry for city, state, and/or zip code.

q.p_radius.name: p_radius
q.p_radius.description: Spatial Search Radius.  Enter a radius up to 100 miles in which to spatially search for facilities.

q.p_reg.name: p_reg
q.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

q.p_sa.name: p_sa
q.p_sa.description: Facility street address. Enter a complete or partial street address.

q.p_sa1.name: p_sa1
q.p_sa1.description: Facility street address. Enter a complete or partial street address.   Note that p_sa1 is culmulative with p_sa.

q.p_sfs.name: p_sfs
q.p_sfs.description: Single Facility Search Filter.  Provide a facility name or program system identifier to limit results.  For the all data search, the FRS registry identifier is also searched.

q.p_sic.name: p_sic
q.p_sic.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code Filter.  Enter a single 4-digit SIC Code to filter results.  If more complex filtering is required, use p_sic2 and p_sic4.

q.p_sic2.name: p_sic2
q.p_sic2.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code Filter Alternate 2. Enter a wild-card search against SIC codes.  A final wild-card is always present allowing "22" to match all SIC codes beginning with 22.  Use the "%" character within strings to match any SIC values with the pattern.  For example, "2%21" matches 2021, 2121, 2221, etc.

q.p_sic4.name: p_sic4
q.p_sic4.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code Filter Alternate 3.  Enter the first 2, 3 or 4 SIC code digits to filter results to facilities having those code prefixes.  As this alternative does not utilize an index, p_sic2 will generally be quicker.

q.p_st.name: p_st
q.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

q.p_trep.name: p_trep
q.p_trep.description:
Current Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) Reporter Limiter.  Enter one of the following codes to limit results.
- CURR = Current TRI reporter.
- NONCURR = Has reported to TRI in the past but not for the current reporting year.

q.p_tribedist.name: p_tribedist
q.p_tribedist.description: Proximity to tribal land limiter. Enter an amount of mile between 0 and 25 to filter results.  This parameter is only evaluated if p_tribeid is populated.

q.p_tribeid.name: p_tribeid
q.p_tribeid.description: Numeric code for tribe (or list of tribes).

q.p_tribename.name: p_tribename
q.p_tribename.description: Tribe Name Filter.  Enter a single tribe name to filter results.

q.p_usmex.name: p_usmex
q.p_usmex.description: US-Mexico Border Flag.  Enter Y/N to restrict searches to facilities located within 100KM of the border.

q.p_wbd.name: p_wbd
q.p_wbd.description: 2-, 4-, 6-, 8-, 10-, or 12-character watershed (WBD from the USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset). May contain multiple comma-separated values.  Uses the FRS Best Pick Coordinate to obtain the WBD12 Huc value.

q.p_ysl.name: p_ysl
q.p_ysl.description:
Last Facility Inspection [within / not within] Specified Date Range Indicator. The date range is determined by parameters p_idt1 and p_idt2 or by parameter p_ysly.
- W = within date range
- N = not within date range

q.p_ysla.name: p_ysla
q.p_ysla.description:
Facility Last Inspection Code Filter.  If left blank, both agencies are included.  Enter a value to limit results:
- E = EPA
- S = State

q.p_ysly.name: p_ysly
q.p_ysly.description: Number of years (1 to 5) since last facility inspection.  A value of 1 means that it has been inspected within the year.

q.p_zip.name: p_zip
q.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

q.pageno.name: pageno
q.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

q.qid.name: qid
q.qid.description: Query ID Selector.  Enter the QueryID number from a previously run query.

q.queryset.name: queryset
q.queryset.description: Query Limiter.  Enter a value to limit the number of records returned for each query. Value cannot exceed 70,000.

q.responseset.name: responseset
q.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

q.summarylist.name: summarylist
q.summarylist.description: Summary List Flag.  Enter a Y to return a list of summary statistics based on the parameters submitted to the query service.

q.tablelist.name: tablelist
q.tablelist.description: Table List Flag. Enter a Y to display the first page of facility results.

q.xmax.name: xmax
q.xmax.description: Maximum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.xmin.name: xmin
q.xmin.description: Minimum longitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymax.name: ymax
q.ymax.description: Maximum latitude value in decimal degrees.

q.ymin.name: ymin
q.ymin.description: Minimum latitude value in decimal degrees.
